means: 开除…的教籍，把…逐出教会

sentence.Network_en: The Chinese Christians, therefore, practically excommunicate themselves from their own clan.
sentence.Network_cn: 所以, 中国的基督徒简直是被逐出了自己的家族了.

sentence.Network_en: Now, I insist that we call upon our bishop to excommunicate him!
sentence.Network_cn: 我坚决提议,去找主教驱逐这个妖人!

sentence.Network_en: Its no longer possible to excommunicate someone already excommunicated.
sentence.Network_cn: 不会再出现开除已经被开除教籍的问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 专八词汇表_百度文库 ... evaporation 蒸发 excommunicate 逐出教会 executor 遗嘱执行人.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... Eve 夏娃 excommunicate 开除……的教籍 friar 修道士.

list.abs: 29 。 On thesentence of excommunication对句禁教Introduction导言
Vto excommunicate 开除教藉; 逐出教会New
The man excommunicated from the Christian Church ., 那人被驱逐出基督教会.
If you make it an excommunication matter , I have nothing more to say , of course ., 如果你动不动就开除教籍什么的 , 我当然就不再说什么了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from ecclesiastical Latin excommunicat- 'excluded from communication with the faithful', from the verb excommunicare, from ex- 'out' + Latin communis 'common to all', on the pattern of Latin communicare (see communicate)

entry.tran: （天主教或东正教）将…逐出教会，开除…的教籍
entry.def: If a Roman Catholic or member of the Orthodox Church is excommunicated, it is publicly and officially stated that the person is no longer allowed to be a member of the Church. This is a punishment for some very great wrong that they have done.

example.ex: Eventually, he was excommunicated along with his mentor...
example.tran: 最后，他和他的导师一起被开除教籍。

example.ex: In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its 'depraved diversion.'
example.tran: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

means.word_mean: 1. exclude from a church or a religious community;

sentences.sentence: "The gay priest was excommunicated when he married his partner"

means.word_mean: 2. oust or exclude from a group or membership by decree

auth_sentence.content: The Church's first thought was to excommunicate Thomas for using pagan logic.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Church's first thought was to excommunicate Thomas for using pagan logic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Church's first thought was to excommunicate Thomas for using pagan logic.

auth_sentence.content: No need to excommunicate him, he like others brought billions into the Holy Roman Vatican.
auth_sentence.res_content: No need to excommunicate him, he like others brought billions into the Holy Roman Vatican.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No need to excommunicate him, he like others brought billions into the Holy Roman Vatican.

means.word_mean: 开除…的教籍,把…逐出教会

sentences.en: The Chinese Christians,therefore, practically excommunicate themselves from their own clan.
sentences.cn: 所以，中国的基督徒简直是被逐出了自己的家族了。

sentences.en: The church excommunicated him, and he gave them groats for pease, he excommunicated them.
sentences.cn: 教会把他逐出教外，他也用同一手段把他们逐出教外。

sentences.en: Their church tells them it’s wrong and, in fact, excommunicated Green years ago.
sentences.cn: 他们的教会告诉他们这是错误的,而事实上,多年前就把格林逐出了教会。
